subject: Re: Idle threats from a coward
author: Lance Oliver
full_text:
Hey Bab,

Even though I've newly begun to chime in here, it seems to me that 
some people are guilty of wearing rose colored glasses, as far as 
Chris is concerned. LOL! I don't know him personally, so I really 
don't know what really motivates him. Right or wrong, by conducting 
himself in the manner he has, it's understandable why his approach 
has drawn the scrutiny from his peers. 

Frankly, this entire effort is a great learning experience and 
potential healing for mankind! I encourage all of us researcher types 
to simply sit back, and take a deep breath or three. Consider 
together why we're doing this. Let's work on making this world a 
better place while we have breath...

Success!
Lance
